channel.title: Silab items
channel.description:
ok i added a bandos command
but when i equip it, it doesnt equip properly
and when i try but all on it it unequips and i can only wear one part of it
whats wrong???

item.title: Silab items
item.dc:creator: @hell_boi hell boi
item.description:
@hell_boi wrote:

but its one item id not two
[br][br][size=1]Posted on: February 09, 2008, 11:43:07 AM[/size][hr]so what i add for bandos?

Read full topic

item.title: Silab items
item.dc:creator: @X_Da_Master_X X Da Master X
item.description:
@X_Da_Master_X wrote:

You need to add the item ID’s in Item.java

you find something like public static int body[] = {1111, 2222};
1111, 2222 are item ID’s

So put your shield in public static int shield[] = {…, …};
legs in public…legs[] = {…, …}
Till evrything is on his place.

Read full topic
